Package popt4jlib.LocalSearch

Local Search algorithms parallel implementation for combinatorial optimization problems.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IntSetNeighborhoodFilterIntf
    extension of NeighborhoodFilterIntf class to work specifically with Set<Integer> arg solutions and Integers as "guides".
    NeighborhoodFilterIntf
    specifies filters for determining "trial" points in the neighborhood of a solution arg, using a "guide" x.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DLS
    class implements a parallel LocalSearch method for combinatorial optimization problems, obeying the popt4jlib.LocalOptimizerIntf contract.
    DLSM
    class implements a parallel LocalSearch method for combinatorial optimization problems, obeying the popt4jlib.LocalOptimizerIntf contract.
    IdentitySearchOptimizer
    class implements a no-search local search that always returns the argument passed to it, along with its evaluation result.
    IntSetN1AllMovesMaker
    the class implements the notion of the N_1 neighborhood of a set of integers.
    IntSetN21AllMovesMaker
    the class implements the notion of the N_{2+1} neighborhood of a set of integers.
    IntSetN2AllMovesMaker
    the class implements the notion of the N_2 neighborhood of a set of integers.
    IntSetN2RXPAllMovesMaker
    the class implements the notion of the N_{-2+P} neighborhood of a set of integers.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    LocalSearchException
    encapsulates exceptions that a Local-Search algorithm may throw.

Package popt4jlib.LocalSearch Description

Local Search algorithms parallel implementation for combinatorial optimization problems.
